definition: DPP (Democratic Progressive Party, Taiwan)/abbr. for 民主進步黨|民主进步党
to go forward/to advance/to go in/to enter/to put in/to submit/to take in/to admit/(math.) base of a number system/classifier for sections in a building or residential compound

sentences.english: The opposition Democratic Progressive Party, which Chen once led, has urged the government to free him immediately.
sentences.chinese: 在野黨民進黨，陳曾經領導過，敦促政府立即釋放他。

sentences.english: But the DPP fears political concessions will be made.
sentences.chinese: 但是民進黨擔心這會造成政治上的讓步。

sentences.english: Wen, a home builder, voted for Chen and his Democratic Progressive Party (DPP) back in 2000.
sentences.chinese: 在2000年，溫爲陳水扁及其民進黨投票。

sentences.english: On May 17th party supporters vented their anger on the streets.
sentences.chinese: 5月17日，部分民進黨支持者走上街頭髮泄怒火。

sentences.english: The pro-independence party rejects the 1992 consensus as a dangerous downgrade of sovereignty.
sentences.chinese: 民進黨拒絕九二共識，認爲那是主權的危險降級。

sentences.english: The DPP's chairwoman , Tsai Ing-wen, says her party will dog Mr Chen wherever he goes.
sentences.chinese: 民進黨主席蔡英文說，民進黨人會一直尾隨陳雲林。

sentences.english: The DPP's chairwoman , Tsai Ing-wen, says her party will dog Mr Chen wherever he goes.
sentences.chinese: 民進黨主席蔡英文說，民進黨人會一直尾隨陳雲林。

sentences.english: Street protests are about all the DPP can do.
sentences.chinese: 民進黨能做的恐怕只有街頭抗議而已。

definition: Taiwan independence/(of Taiwan) to declare independence
Ma Ying-jeou (1950-), Taiwanese Kuomintang politician, Mayor of Taipei 1998-2006, president of Republic of China 2008-2016
Chen Shui-Bian (1950-), Taiwanese DPP 民進黨|民进党 politician, president of the Republic of China 2000-2008
Green Standard Army, standing infantry during Qing dynasty, originally formed from Ming and other Chinese army units
within the party (esp. Chinese communist party)
to be a candidate in an election or other selection process/to run for office/to turn out to vote
William Lai Ching-te (1959-), Taiwanese DPP politician, vice president of the Republic of China from 2020
